ygData.subject: Re: Fiery Avenger really that good?
ygData.msgSnippet: your paladin would miss a lot more than 1 out of 8 fighting a monk.  monks are all about not getting hit.  a monk could duel any class and own them except
ygData.messageBody:
your paladin would miss a lot more than 1 out of 8 fighting a monk. monks are all about not
getting hit. a monk could duel any class and own them except possibly a wizard if he got the monk
rooted right away. otherwise he would be dead as all hell. a necro might have a chance too, if he
could get a dot or 2 or 3 on the monk (doubt this) he could kite him around the zone and eventually
kill him. but no melee classes can compare to a monk. monks kick ass.

Tim West wrote:

> From: "Tim West" <twest@...>
>
> My Paladin only misses once out of every eight tries. You also have to
> take into account that we can buff ourselves pretty well stacking our
> spirit armor, bravery, and guard spells to take our AC beyond that of a
> warrior or monk and Symbal of Tranzil to add 250 more hit points by itself.
>
> I think Verant has done a pretty good job in making the classes pretty
> comparable.
>
